item.description:
Our next Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Thursday, March 31st at Dogpatch Labs located at One Cambridge Center 6th Floor in Cambridge. This is the large brick building next to the Kendall Square Red Line T stop.

At 6:30 Brad Harkavy will give his presentation "Different Investors for Different Folks". Brad Harkavy has 20 years of technical and management experience bringing new companies and products to life. Currently, Harkavy is the President of Harkador Partners, where he offers part-time CEO services, and is developing business models and business strategies for his start up clients. He sits on the Board of Directors and Advisory Board of several early stage companies.

At 7 PM Jim Geisman of Software Pricing Partners will present Software Pricing for SaaS Startups. Jim Geisman is founder and principal of Software Pricing Partners, Inc. where he provides senior management counsel and marketing and sales consulting services. He has led consulting engagements for a broad range of clients addressing fundamental issues affecting business success.

At 7:30 PM Michael Preshman of RippleFunction and at 8 PM Candice Cabe of Day2Night Heels will pitch their startups to Tom Egan of Launch Capital.

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

We do not have a pizza sponsor for this date. If you know of any sponsors that want a good plug in the beginning of the meeting and a top ranked logo placement on the left side of our Meetup site as a sponsor, please have them contact me.

-Marsh Sutherland
Boston BizSpark Meetup Organizer
item.name: Investors Review, SaaS Startup Pricing| RippleFunction & Day2Night Heels Pitches
